cv.name: Fabien Masson
cv.summary: As a Full Stack Engineer, I have successfully taken multiple products from 0 to 1. I lead teams effectively, ensuring an environment where people can do their best work. Currently, I work mostly with TypeScript, React, Node.js, and GraphQL. I have over 8 years of experience in working remotely with companies all around the world.

Direction générale des finances : Tutorat d'une équipe interne de 4 développeurs, aux outils de développements Oracle. Spécification et réalisation d'applications.
